Key Match Events: Craig Goodwin scored a goal to put Australia ahead in the 53rd minute.
Lewis Miller scored a goal for Australia in the 45+2 minute, equalizing the score.
Nishan Velupillay scored a goal for Australia in the 90+ minute, sealing the win.
Australia recovered from going a goal down to secure a 3-1 win.
Post-Match Reflections: Tony Popovic's era started with a win, indicating a positive start.
Craig Goodwin was named player of the match.
China coach Branko Ivankovic acknowledged the difficulty of the draw and expressed the team's determination to improve.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Adelaide Oval.
The final score was 3-1 in favor of Australia.
Nishan Velupillay made his debut and scored on his first appearance for the team.
The match marked a new record attendance of 46,291 for the Socceroos at Adelaide Oval.
